alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duval County through 400 PM EDT... At 329 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Marco, or over Jacksonville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ortega, San Marco, Riverside and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. For boaters on or near the St Johns River or Intracoastal waterway, move to a safe shelter now! Do not be caught on or near the water. Gusty winds and choppy waves are likely. Make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
